name: Caveground
description:
Caveground is a game where you can explore three procedural gernerated landscapes with cavesystems.

Manipulate the terrain using different brush shapes.

Build structures using a simple snapping system.

Saving the game

The save files for the different environments can be found under:

Windows:

\Users\Username\AppData\LocalLow\Caveground\Caveground

Linux:

/home/Username/.config/unity3d/Caveground/Caveground

To reset the environment just delete the folder named after the environment you want to reset.
